member.name: M:Sims.Far.Far.Extract
member.summary: Extract all files from the far file.

member.name: M:Sims.Far.Far.Extract(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Extract files from the far file with an inclusive filter. Only files in this enumerable will be extracted.

member.name: M:Sims.Far.Far.Extract(System.String)
member.summary: Extract all files from the far file to a specified directory.
member.param: The directory to extract files to.

member.name: M:Sims.Far.Far.Extract(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Extract files from the far file with an inclusive filter to the specified directory.
member.param: The directory to extract files to.
